wikipedia_page.main: Darren Mark Brown (18 January 1962 – 6 December 2006), known as Wiz, was lead-singer and guitarist of English indie punk band Mega City Four in the late 1980s and early 1990s, and later bands Serpico and Ipanema from 2002 to 2006.
